config.script:
logger = system.util.getLogger('addProductCode')
	
	try:
	    params = {
	        "productCode": self.view.custom.ProductCode,
	        "description": self.view.custom.Description,
	        "enabled": self.view.custom.Enabled,
	        "idealRunRate": self.view.custom.IdealRunRate,
	        "rateUoM": self.view.custom.UoM,
	        "perUnitCost": self.view.custom.PerUnitCost,
	        "instructions": self.view.custom.Instructions
	    }
	    
	    # Check for any key value pairs that are empty.
	    if any(not v for v in params.values()):
	        raise ValueError('One or more input values are empty.')
	    
	    queryPath = "app/Schedule/addProductCode"
	    system.db.runNamedQuery(queryPath, params)
	    system.perspective.sendMessage("addedPC")
	    system.perspective.closePopup("addProductCode")
	
	except Exception as e:
	    errorParams = {
	        "ModalName": "ErrorModal",
	        "ErrorMessage": str(e),
	    }
	
	    system.perspective.openPopup("ErrorModal", "GlobalComponents/Modals/ErrorModal", errorParams)
	    logger.warn('There was an error: ' + str(e))

DisabledPopup.message: Please sign in as quarterback to proceed.
DisabledPopup.title: Invalid Permissions
